name: King Of Scooter Race
description:
Become King of SCOOTER!
Only with us you can feel the extreme that you get from the stunts on a scooter! Lots of different scooters, 10 epic maps, over 25 different tricks, and more...just go into the game and show what you can do.

Our first game "King of Dirt BMX" downloaded more than 10 000 000 people!

Imagine a brand new Skate Park, dozens of your friends on scooters doing tricks on dirt, perform freestyle, sports and extreme in their blood!
What are you worse?
Nothing!
You go to the racing trail and start on your scooter to perform amazing stunts!
You can be on MTB, BMX, Scooter or usual bike - it does not matter, the main thing that it was a scooter. LoL. Only on a scooter you will be able to overcome without problems the race of your Skate Park.

Join us, we have the follow features:
1) Ride 9 legendary SCOOTERS!
2) Pull massive air in 10 epic TRAILS.
3) Design your very own personal SCOOTER!
4) Experience adrenaline - fueled CHALLENGES.
5) Special BONUSES for the best scooter players!
6) 28 different tricks!
7) Сompete with friends!


Can you do a cool bangers? Yes, you can do a cool bangers!
Download now!
Lets pump it!
